page.title: 01Brookmans Park Village
page.content: Brookmans Park is really not a village in the true sense. In the old villages, people were born and brought up there and usually worked there all their lives. Brookmans Park is a commuter village with most of the population working either in London or nearby large towns. This is why the main railway line to Moorgate and King's Cross is so important as it is used by a large number of business men to get to work. Most of the people who live in Brookmans Park are quite wealthy and the houses are mostly detached and very expensive. Many of the roads are private and the upkeep is paid for by the residents. Apart from the houses in the village, the area being studied is mostly country as we are in the Green Belt.
